      • map

        public static final double map(double value,
                               double dataMin,
                               double dataMax,
                               double plottedMin,
                               double plottedMax)
        map the data to the available space of the screen
        Parameters:
        value - [Type: double, original data values of x and y ]
        dataMin - [Type: double, starting values of x and y ]
        dataMax - [Type: double, ending values of x and y ]
        plottedMin - [Type: double, holds minimum x coordinate and maximum y coordinates ]
        plottedMax - [Type: double, holds minimum y coordinate and maximum x coordinate ]
        Returns:
        mappedValue of type double
